desc: The first Mezcal Hard Seltzer. A Premium, handcrafted, authentically Mexican drink with unparalleled quality and taste. The lowest calorie Hard Seltzer on the market. 75 Calories. 1g Carbs. 5% Alcohol. Artisanal. Gluten Free. Keto Friendly

layout.text: The World's First Hard Seltzer Infused with Mezcal
